hypothesis_content.title: BTC ETF Flow Momentum Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: A daily net inflow of $200M+ into US Spot Bitcoin ETFs, following a 3-day outflow streak, triggers a positive momentum reversal in BTC price over the next 48 hours, with a median return of +3.5%.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Recent news highlights a $459M inflow reversing an outflow trend. Large, contra-trend institutional flows signal renewed buying pressure and can catalyze short-term momentum as market sentiment shifts. The 3-day outflow streak builds pent-up demand.
entry_conditions: BTC ETF aggregate net inflow >= $200M (single day)
Preceded by 3 consecutive days of aggregate net outflows
BTC price is above its 20-day simple moving average
Entry at next daily candle open after flow data is confirmed

exit_conditions.take_profit: 48 hours after entry OR +5.0% price appreciation, whichever comes first
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours after entry if TP/SL not hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 48-hour return after signal is <= +1.0% OR win rate < 55% over 20+ instances.
